commit message:
improved consistency of calendar handling:
when user grants permission, we immediately init planner
on app start, we check for permission and request it if a planner calendar is set
TODO: when VersionInfoDialog is shown, need to perform the check after user dismisses the dialog; in restore, we do not handle missing permission correctly yet
ask for calendar permission also if we are handling an app upgrade
upon restore of backup we need to check if we have permission to write to calendar
fixes typo, on Blackberry we need to hide selection of plan restore strategy
undelete transaction needs to trigger cursor refresh
remove check for second same currency account
row for transfer amount, make calculator input flexible so that it can be bound to multiple amount inputs
added switch of transfer amount rows
We try to preserve the selected transfer account when first account is changed if possible

storing transfer amount in database, and populate UI with it.
Still TODO: Display transfer amount in TransactionDetailFragment, handle case where transfer currency has different number of fraction digits
display not-same-currency transfers in detail fragment
handle difference of number of fraction digits when reconfiguring amount input
moved handling of fraction digits into EditText subclass and apply it to both amount and transfer amount
need to pause text watcher while loading transfer
load last exchange rate for new transfers
hopefully fix crash on some 5.1 devices
update help with new foreign exchange transfer feature
if password protection is active, changes to related settings require password
fixed test, and encapsulated amount (still need to improve since client still can manipulate the amount directly)
fix issue of corrupted restoration upon orientation change: TransferAmount needs its own id; deactivate watchers during instance state restoration; do not load exchange rate
get rid of verbose no category assigned label
do not hardcode path to internal data directory
fix division by BigDecimals between 0 and 1
checking for permission in application onCreate has been reported to crash on NGM Forward_Prime
